    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.4ff79cde:
Get the Data Working with the Ecommerce Customers csv file from the company. It has Customer info, suchas Email, Address, and their color Avatar. Then it also has numerical value columns:

Avg. Session Length: Average session of in-store style advice sessions. Time on App: Average time spent on App in minutes Time on Website: Average time spent on Website in minutes Length of Membership: How many years the customer has been a member.

Reading in the Ecommerce Customers csv file as a DataFrame.
source.9d698e82:
Linear regression

Linear Regression is a machine learning algorithm based on supervised learning. It performs a regression task. Regression models a target prediction value based on independent variables.
